name: NavigationView
desc: A view for presenting a stack of views that represents a visible path in a navigation hierarchy.

items.name: func navigationViewStyle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the style for navigation views within this view.

items.name: protocol NavigationViewStyle
items.desc: A specification for the appearance and interaction of a NavigationView.

items.name: func navigationTitle(LocalizedStringKey) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the view’s title for purposes of navigation, using a localized string.

items.name: func navigationTitle(Text) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the view’s title for purposes of navigation.

items.name: func navigationTitle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the view’s title for purposes of navigation, using a string.

items.name: func navigationTitle<V>(() -> V) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the view’s title for purposes of navigation, using a custom view.

items.name: func navigationSubtitle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the view’s subtitle for purposes of navigation, using a string.

items.name: func navigationSubtitle(Text) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the view’s subtitle for purposes of navigation.

items.name: func navigationSubtitle(LocalizedStringKey) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the view’s subtitle for purposes of navigation, using a localized string.

items.name: func navigationBarHidden(Bool) -> some View
items.desc: Hides the navigation bar for this view.

items.name: func navigationBarBackButtonHidden(Bool) -> some View
items.desc: Hides the navigation bar back button for the view.

items.name: func navigationBarTitleDisplayMode(NavigationBarItem.TitleDisplayMode) -> some View
items.desc: Configures the title display mode for this view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.
